column4: so how do you deal with one silly program that wont install until you have libstdc++.so.5 when you already have libstdc++.so.6....why won't it work with just that one....Is there a safe way to add so.5 without messing up the other programs on the machine.....is this akin to dll hell in windows?
since the last .# is differnt the 2 should be able to coexist on the same system.
or you could recompile the app to use the newer lib.
never heard/noticed anything about it to be honest.  cant recall any explosive debates on it in here.
